function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Restrictions on levels of crowding on public transport","Impact":"Reduced efficiency in public transport and potential congestion","Mitigation":"Implementing staggered work hours and increasing frequency of trains and buses","Technologies":"Automated crowd monitoring systems","People":"Public transport users","Owner":"Transport authorities"},{"Description":"Fewer office workers in the city","Impact":"Reduction in economic activity and productivity","Mitigation":"Investing in remote working technologies and promoting flexible work arrangements","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools and telecommuting software","People":"Employers, employees","Owner":"Businesses and government"},{"Description":"Increased sanitation requirements","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission due to inadequate sanitation","Mitigation":"Implementing regular and thorough cleaning protocols","Technologies":"Sanitization robots and UV disinfection systems","People":"City residents, visitors","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Monitoring people for high temperatures or signs of illness","Impact":"Failure to identify and isolate potential carriers of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing temperature screening and health monitoring at public places","Technologies":"Thermal imaging cameras and contactless thermometers","People":"General public","Owner":"Health authorities and government"}]}
